thread.title: Ronaldo scores 500th goal, ties Raul's Real Madrid record
thread.title_full: Ronaldo scores 500th goal, ties Raul's Real Madrid record - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Ronaldo scores 500th goal, ties Raul's Real Madrid record
text: 1 Oct 2015In Football, Cristiano Ronaldo equalled Raul's all-time goals record for Real Madrid and took his career tally to 500 by scoring a brace against Malmo in Sweden to give Real Madrid a 2-0 win in Group-A match of the UEFA Champions League . Already the top scorer in the competition's history, Ronaldo rifled home his 81st and 82nd Champions League goals and took his Real tally to 323 alongside Raul.. Â»
